title: Letter size and tips in general
content:
This is probably a tuff one or at least a question which calls for many answers. Im not looking for easy solutions just for tips and tricks and experiences to get my type life a little easier going. People might have different ways of doing this whole designing letter stuff so just share you knowlegde please;)   
   
My main concern is letter size. I
author: peterc
